Reference

All functions

add_days_of_week_columns()

Add columns for days of the week to smoothed data

analyze_coef_table()

Combine projection loss and prediction error calculation into a single evaluation.

analyze_prediction_table()

Combine projection loss and prediction error calculation into a single evaluation.

build_and_save_database()

Preprocess all available files and add to database

build_coefficient_table()

Build a table of coefficients over the prediction period based on the database model table

build_prediction_table()

Given the configuration and prediction data frame, build a prediction table

compute_real_loss()

Compute the Proxy Loss

create_cbc_features()

Construct a tibble containing the quartiles of the CBC values and lagged features

create_dataset()

Construct a dataset for use in forecasting

get_SBC_config()

Get the global package variable sbc_config.

get_SBC_features()

Obtain the exact features used in the model

ma()

Computing moving average of all past values including last value using a window size

ms()

Computing moving sum of all past values including last value using a window size

predict_for_date()

Predict usage for a specified date

predict_usage_over_range()

Database version of range prediction

prediction_error()

Compute the RMSE of predicted vs. actual next-3-day product usage by day of week

process_all_cbc_files()

Process all cbc files in a folder and generate qc reports

process_all_census_files()

Process all census files in a folder and generate qc reports

process_all_inventory_files()

Process all inventory files in a folder and generate qc reports

process_all_surgery_files()

Process all surgery files in a folder and generate qc reports

process_all_transfusion_files()

Process all transfusion files in a folder and generate qc reports

process_data_for_date()

Process data for a particular date by reading files per configuration and date

projection_loss()

Compute the loss value on a validation or test dataset from the original and adjusted waste and inventory levels based on model projections.

read_next_three_surgery_files()

Read a surgery file data for following 3 days and return tibble and summary

read_one_cbc_file()

Read a single cbc file data and return it, as is

read_one_census_file()

Read a single census file data and return it, as is

read_one_inventory_file()

Read a single inventory file and return it, as is

read_one_surgery_file()

Read a single day surgery file data and return tibble and summary

read_one_transfusion_file()

Read a single transfusion file data and return it, as is

real_loss()

Compute the true average daily loss based on actual inventory levels during the prediction period.

recommend_collection()

Generate a recommendation for number of platelets to collect today based on predicted usage.

reset_config()

Reset the global package variable sbc_config

save_report_file()

Save a generated report file in the report folder with the appropriate name

sbc_dashboard()

Run the Stanford Blood Center dashboard app

scale_dataset()

Scale the dataset and return the scaling parameters

set_config_param()

Set SBC configuration parameter to a specified value

set_features_from_file()

Gather and set feature names from a single (most recent) data file

set_initial_collection_data()

Set the initial number of units that will be collected for the first three days

set_initial_expiry_data()

Set the initial number of units that will expire in a day and the next

set_org_col_params()

Set the important column names contained in the organization's file types

smooth_cbc_features()

Smooth the CBC features using a moving average

summarize_and_clean_cbc()

Summarize and clean the raw cbc data

summarize_and_clean_census()

Summarize and clean the raw census data

summarize_and_clean_inventory()

Summarize and clean the raw transfusion data

summarize_and_clean_surgery_next_three_day()

Summarize and clean the raw surgery data

summarize_and_clean_surgery_single_day()

Summarize and clean the raw surgery data

summarize_and_clean_transfusion()

Summarize and clean the raw transfusion data

upsert_to_database()

Helper Database upsert function
